Package etomica.modules.glass

Class MeterCorrelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.modules.glass.MeterCorrelation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceIndependent, IDataSource, ConfigurationStorage.ConfigurationStorageListener

    public class MeterCorrelation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationStorage.ConfigurationStorageListener, IDataSource, DataSourceIndependent
    Meter for tabulation of the atomic radial distribution function (RDF). The meter takes data via actionPerformed and returns the average RDF via getData.
